title: Citizen Magus: A Roman Fantasy Adventure
description: Stuck in a strange time. Daemons lurking at every turn. And those are the least of his worries.Remington Blakes, a magus from an alternate twenty-first century powered by magic, is abandoned in ancient Rome by his mentor without any memory of how or why. Forced to make a living as a magus-for-hire, he takes on the name "Natta Magus" and begins his journey to uncover the truth behind his mentor's betrayal.When Natta learns his mentor has conjured daemons to kidnap a senatorâ€™s daughter, he must use all of his powers and cunning to not only rescue the child but uncover the dark secret behind why he was stranded.Citizen Magus is the first book in The Journals of Natta Magus series, a must-read for fans of Roman alternate history and fantasy. Grab your copy of Rob Steiner's thrilling magical adventure today.
author: Rob Steiner
